meanings.definition: superlative form of yappy, meaning excessively talkative or noisy
meanings.sent1: The chatty parrot in the pet store was the yappiest bird I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The yappiest dog in the neighborhood barks all day long.
meanings.sent3: The yappiest squirrel in the park kept chattering away, entertaining the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the yappiest stream, bubbling with joy.
meanings.sent5: The yappiest child in the class never stopped sharing stories with everyone.

meanings.definition: in a manner that is excessively talkative or noisy
meanings.sent1: She talked yappiest during the movie, disturbing everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The parrot chirped yappiest when the sun rose, waking up the whole house.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled yappiest during the quiet exam, causing the teacher to frown.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled yappiest through the trees on that stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The radio blared yappiest in the early morning, startling the sleepy listeners.

meanings.definition: a person or thing that is excessively talkative or noisy
meanings.sent1: The yappiest in the office was always sharing the latest gossip.
meanings.sent2: The little puppy turned out to be the yappiest in the litter, never staying quiet.
meanings.sent3: The yappiest at the party was the comedian, making everyone laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: The old clock in the hallway was the yappiest, ticking loudly every second.
meanings.sent5: The yappiest in the group was the toddler, babbling happily to anyone who would listen.
